text: L'Express is a French-language daily newspaper, published in Mauritius since 1963 and owned by La Sentinelle, Ltd. L'Express endeavours to cover Mauritian news in an independent and impartial manner, as described in its code of conduct for journalists. It is the most widely-read daily in Mauritius and constantly changes to keep up with the latest trends in journalism and the newspaper business. The Sunday version of L'Express is called L'Express Dimanche. == See also == *List of newspapers in Mauritius ==References== == External links == * * Real Estate Portal Mauritius L'express Property * Official Facebook Page Category:1963 establishments in Mauritius Category:Newspapers published in Mauritius Category:Publications established in 1963 Category:French-language newspapers published in Africa
title: L'Express (Mauritius)
